page.title: 19ABBOTS LEIGH SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: {SCHOOL-}Out of 31 people,9 chose Abbots Leigh;4 chose other schools;8 chose Independent schools;4 chose college;6 chose university. {RESIDENCE-}Out of 44 people,12 have lived here for <5 years;16 for between 5-15 years;16 for >15 years.10 have relations who also live in Abbots Leigh {SPORTS-}23 out of 86 liked walking;9 liked cricket;4 liked horse riding. Other sports were football,rugby, jogging,swimming,tennis,sailing and athletics. {EVENTS-}26 out of 42 liked the Balloon Fiesta;2 liked the Historical Rally;10 for the N.Somerset Show and 4 for the Horse Show. {FACILITIES-}Most regularly visited was the Abbots Pool.Sometimes visited by many was Leigh Woods.The cricket club was rarely visited.
